required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Clomiphene Citrate on Uterine Blood Fow in Women With Unexplained Delayed Conception
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Clomiphene Citrate on Uterine Hemodynamics in Women With Unexplained Infertility

brief_summary.textblock: In a prospective observational study at a university teaching hospital, blood flow indices and serum hormone levels were compared between spontaneous and stimulated cycles in the same group of 50 patients with unexplained delayed conception.

detailed_description.textblock: In a prospective observational study at a university teaching hospital, the mid-luteal (peri-implantation) endometrial thickness and volume, uterine artery pulsatility index (PI) and resistance index (RI), endometrial and subendometrial vascularization index, flow index, and vascularization flow index, and serum estradiol and progesterone levels were compared between spontaneous and clomiphene citrate stimulated cycles in the same group of 50 patients with unexplained infertility.

primary_outcome.measure: Flow index of the endometrial region
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
primary_outcome.description: Flow index of the endometrial region was measured by a researcher

secondary_outcome.measure: Vascularization index of the endometrial region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Vascularization index of the endometrial region was measured by a researcher

secondary_outcome.measure: Vascularization flow index of the endometrial region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Vascularization flow index of the endometrial region was measured by a researcher

secondary_outcome.measure: Vascularization flow index of the sub-endometrial region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Vascularization flow index of the sub-endometrial region was measured by a researcher

secondary_outcome.measure: Flow index of the sub-endometrial region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Flow index of the sub-endometrial region was measured by a researcher

secondary_outcome.measure: Vascularization index of the sub-endometrial region
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 22 to 24 of the menstrual cycle
secondary_outcome.description: Vascularization index of the sub-endometrial region was measured by a researcher

intervention.description: The mid-luteal endometrial thickness and volume, uterine vascularization indices of uterine artery pulsatility index and resistance index, endometrial and subendometrial vascularization index, flow index, and vascularization flow index, and serum estradiol and progesterone levels were calculated in spontaneous then stimulated cycles in the same group of infertile patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Unexplained infertility
- Body mass index less than 30
- Regular menstruation
- Normal pelvic examination and ultrasonography
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of pelvic operations including cesarean section
- History of pelvic inflammatory disease
- Endometriosis
- Pelvic pathology including uterine fibroids
- General disease or medication that could potentially affect pelvic blood flow
- Smoking

facility.name: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Kasr Al-Ainy hospital, Cairo University
